title: Ex-Officer Involved in Raid That Killed Breonna Taylor Found Not Guilty of Wanton Endangerment
sub_head: Former Louisville detective Brett Hankison was the only officer charged; counts were related to shots fired into neighborâ€™s apartment
body:
A Kentucky jury acquitted former Louisville police detective Brett Hankison on three counts of wanton endangerment related to a 2020 raid during which Breonna Taylor was fatally shot.
Ms. Taylor, a 26-year-old Black emergency-medical technician, was asleep with her boyfriend in her Louisville home in March 2020 when she was roused from sleep by police who had secured a no-knock warrant to search her home.
